Material used.Description: Reporter construct with let-7-binding sites in 3′UTR was used to measure miRNA pathway activity.

Readout description.Result Description: Pathogenic variants increased reporter expression compared to wild-type.
Pathogenic variants increased reporter expression compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Reporter expression within baseline range (no significant change).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reporter expression increased by ≥20% compared to baseline.

Material used.Description: RNAi-mediated knockdown and transgenic overexpression were used to assess LRRK2 function.

Readout description.Result Description: Pathogenic variants disrupted miRNA pathway regulation.
Pathogenic variants disrupted miRNA pathway regulation.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No significant change in miRNA pathway activity.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant alteration in miRNA pathway activity.
